// {{{ NX.Array.each

/**
 * @class NX.Array
 */

/**
 * @method each
 *
 * "write it"
 *
 * @param o {Object} xxx
 * @return {Object}
 */
module.exports = function(array, fn, scope, reverse) {

    array = NX.Array.from(array);

    var i, ln = array.length;

    if(reverse !== true) {

        for(i = 0; i < ln; i++) {

            if(fn.call(scope || array[i], array[i], i, array) === false) {
                return i;
            }

        }

    } else {

        for(i = ln - 1; i > -1; i--) {

            if(fn.call(scope || array[i], array[i], i, array) === false) {
                return i;
            }

        }
    }

    return true;
};

// }}}

/*
 * Local variables:
 * tab-width: 4
 * c-basic-offset: 4
 * c-hanging-comment-ender-p: nil
 * End:
 */
